entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
